00004 /*!  \file  octeon-opcodes.h
00005      \brief Common: Opcodes used in host-core communication.
00006 */
00007 
00008 
00009 #ifndef __OCTEON_OPCODES_H__
00010 #define __OCTEON_OPCODES_H__
00011 
00012 /** Opcodes used in Octeon Host-Core communication.
00013  *
00014  *    15 14                                         0
00015  *   -------------------------------------------------
00016  *   |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |
00017  *   -------------------------------------------------
00018  *    ^   ^
00019  *    |   |
00020  *    |  Raw Mode
00021  *   Direction  
00022  *
00023  *  Opcodes are 16-bit wide. Bit 15 determines the direction of the operation.
00024  *  Bit 15 is 0 for operations on the Core and 1 for operation on the host.
00025  *  So,
00026  *      Opcodes in the range 0x0000 to 0x7FFF are used by the Octeon host 
00027  *      driver and applications. 
00028  *      Opcodes in the range 0x8000 to 0xFFFF are used by the Octeon core
00029  *      driver and applications.
00030  *  
00031  *  Bit 14 can be used for raw mode operations. For such operations, the 
00032  *  driver will not create a recv_pkt_t but instead send the  
00033  */ 
00034 
00035 #define OCT_RAW_OP_MASK            0x4000
00036 
00037 
00038 #define OPCODE_IS_RAW(opcode)      (opcode & OCT_RAW_OP_MASK)
00039 
00040 
00041 
00042 
00043 /* Opcodes used by host driver/apps to perform operations on the core */
00044 /* Opcodes in the ranges
00045    - (0x1000 to 0x1FFF) & (0x7000 to 0x7FFF) are reserved by the host driver 
00046    - (0x8000 to 0x8FFF) & (0xF001 to 0xFFFF) are reserved by the core driver */
00047 #include "octeon-drv-opcodes.h"
00048 
00049 
00050 
00051 
00052 /* Crypto OP codes (4000 - 40ff)*/
00053 /* This is the major opcode for Crypto Operations */
00054 #define CVM_CRYPTO                     0x4000
00055 /* The following are Crypto Minor opcodes. 
00056    The value of the opcode passed is Logical OR of CVM_CRYPTO and 
00057    the following minor */
00058 #define CVM_HASH_SHA1                  0x0000
00059 #define CVM_HASH_SHA1_INIT             0x0001
00060 #define CVM_HASH_SHA1_UPDATE           0x0002
00061 #define CVM_HASH_SHA1_FINAL            0x0003
00062 #define CVM_HASH_MD5                   0x0004
00063 #define CVM_HASH_MD5_INIT              0x0005
00064 #define CVM_HASH_MD5_UPDATE            0x0006
00065 #define CVM_HASH_MD5_FINAL             0x0007
00066 #define CVM_HASH_HMAC                  0x0008
00067 #define CVM_HASH_HMAC_CTX_INIT         0x0009
00068 #define CVM_HASH_HMAC_INIT             0x000a
00069 #define CVM_HASH_HMAC_UPDATE           0x000b
00070 #define CVM_HASH_HMAC_FINAL            0x000c
00071 #define CVM_DES_SET_KEY_CHECKED        0x000d
00072 #define CVM_AES_ECB_ENCRYPT            0x002a
00073 #define CVM_AES_ECB_DECRYPT            0x002b
00074 #define CVM_DES_EDE3_ECB_ENCRYPT       0x002c
00075 #define CVM_DES_EDE3_ECB_DECRYPT       0x002d
00076 #define CVM_DES_EDE3_CBC_ENCRYPT       0x000e
00077 #define CVM_DES_EDE3_CBC_DECRYPT       0x000f
00078 #define CVM_DES_NCBC_ENCRYPT           0x0010
00079 #define CVM_DES_NCBC_DECRYPT           0x0011
00080 #define CVM_AES_SET_ENCRYPT_KEY        0x0012
00081 #define CVM_AES_SET_DECRYPT_KEY        0x0013
00082 #define CVM_AES_CBC_ENCRYPT            0x0014
00083 #define CVM_AES_CBC_DECRYPT            0x0015
00084 #define CVM_RC4_SET_KEY                0x0016
00085 #define CVM_RC4_ENCRYPT                0x0017
00086 #define CVM_RC4_DECRYPT                0x0018
00087 #define CVM_DSA_GENERATE_PARAMETERS    0x0019
00088 #define CVM_DSA_GENERATE_KEY           0x001a
00089 #define CVM_DSA_SIGN                   0x001b
00090 #define CVM_DSA_VERIFY                 0x001c
00091 #define CVM_DSA_DO_SIGN                0x001d
00092 #define CVM_DSA_DO_VERIFY              0x001e
00093 #define CVM_DH_GENERATE_PARAMETERS     0x001f
00094 #define CVM_DH_GENERATE_KEY            0x0020
00095 #define CVM_DH_COMPUTE_KEY             0x0021
00096 #define CVM_RSA_GENERATE_KEY           0x0022
00097 #define CVM_RSA_SIGN                   0x0024
00098 #define CVM_RSA_VERIFY                 0x0025
00099 #define CVM_RSA_PUBLIC_ENCRYPT         0x0026
00100 #define CVM_RSA_PRIVATE_DECRYPT        0x0027
00101 #define CVM_RSA_PRIVATE_ENCRYPT        0x0028
00102 #define CVM_RSA_PUBLIC_DECRYPT         0x0029

00106 /*  SSL  Record Processing Opcodes  */
00107 /* Opcodes reserved for SSL 0x4100 to 0x41ff */
00108 /** Major opcode for SSL record processing application **/
00109 #define CVM_SSL_RP                     0x4100
00110 /** Minor opcodes for some of the operations in SSL RP **/ 
00111 #define CVM_SRP_ALLOC_CONTEXT          0x0001
00112 #define CVM_SRP_FREE_CONTEXT           0x0002
00113 #define CVM_SRP_AES_SHA1_ENCRYPT       0x0003
00114 #define CVM_SRP_AES_SHA1_DECRYPT       0x0004
00115 #define CVM_SRP_WRITE_CONTEXT          0x0005
00116 
00117 
00118 /*
00119  * windows specific opcodes
00120  * 
00121  * 0x2000 - 0x20ff are reserved for operations on core
00122  * 0x9000 - 0x90ff are reserved for operations on host
00123  * 
00124  * WIN_<kind of driver>_<operation> where <kind of driver> is IPSEC or TOE
00125  */
00126 
00127 /*
00128  * IPSEC driver opcodes
00129  */
00130 
00131 /* Control operations (host to core) */
00132 #define WIN_IPSEC_GET_MAC_PHY_INFO        0x2000
00133 #define WIN_IPSEC_SET_MAC_PHY_INFO        0x2001
00134 #define WIN_IPSEC_ADD_SA                          0x2002
00135 #define WIN_IPSEC_DELETE_SA                      0x2003
00136 
00137 /* Packet operations (host to core) */
00138 #define WIN_IPSEC_SEND_PLAIN_PACKET         0x20f0
00139 #define WIN_IPSEC_SEND_IPSEC_PACKET         0x20f1
00140 
00141 /* Control opcodes (core to host) */
00142 #define WIN_IPSEC_CHANGE_IN_MAC_PHY_INFO 0x9000
00143 
00144 /* Packet operations (core to host) */
00145 #define WIN_IPSEC_RECV_PLAIN_PACKET        0x90f0
00146 #define WIN_IPSEC_RECV_IPSEC_PACKET        0X90f1

00153 #define OCTEON_TAG_TYPE_ATOMIC         0x01
00154 #define OCTEON_TAG_TYPE_NULL           0x02
00155 #define OCTEON_TAG_TYPE_NULL_NULL      0x03
